title: ZaZaZa
typeOfFood: Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pizzeria with a few area locations - see website for details. Offers a variety of veggie toppings, including eggplant, hummus, zucchini, asparagus, artichoke, and mushrooms; plus a couple vegan suitable dipping sauces. Has whole grain crust and a gluten free pizza prepared off site. Extensive salad list.
